channel.title: Team Foundation Server Deployment
channel.description: In some recent forums posts, it has struck me that it is sometimes not clear to people what an install of Microsoft Team Foundation Server looks like.  I’m posting a copy of a (very simple) slide I normally use when...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Daniel Westerdale+00:00
item.description: This looks really good. I did a presentation the other day on VS + TFS 2008 to our developer community and I could have done with this. Out of interest, is the build server able to automatically shedule deployments of the MSIs or update website and or web services.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Westerdale
